string-array.name: onboarding_descriptions
string-array.item: Start, pause and resume recordings. Highlight specific positions in recordings with customizable markers.
Choose an individual name and storage location. Attach up to three customizable labels for organizing.
Sort, filter and share your recordings or organize them by creating folders and subfolders.
Cut out unneeded parts. Add, delete and attach comments to marks.
Customize labels, markers and default values. Enable rotation so the microphone is facing the interviewee.
